title: b.energy Campaign
description: Designed the campaign website and campaign material for b.energy's affiliate campaign at Adservice.
challenge: Adservice is an affiliate company that connects advertisers and publishers. b.energy was one of our advertisers which wanted to generate more leads through our gamification concept "LeadPlatform".
solution: A campaign website and campaign material were designed resulting in 25.000+ visitiors and and a 50%+ conversion rate.
